snippet: New York’s top court refused to hear another appeal by Rick Dutrow Jr., the Kentucky Derby-winning trainer, on his 10-year ban from the sport for drug violations.
abstract: New York high court refuses to hear another appeal by Kentucky Derby-winning trainer Rick Dutrow Jr on his 10-year ban from horse racing for drug violations.
lead_paragraph: New York’s top court refused to hear another appeal by Rick Dutrow Jr., the Kentucky Derby-winning trainer, on his 10-year ban from the sport for drug violations.

headline.main: Dutrow Loses Appeal on 10-Year Horse Racing Ban
